|  --- | --- |
|  [createElement(tagName)](./blockly.utils.xml.createelement.md) | Create DOM element for XML. |

|  [domToText(dom)](./blockly.utils.xml.domtotext.md) | Converts a DOM structure into plain text. Currently the text format is fairly ugly: all one line with no whitespace. |

|  [textToDomDocument(text)](./blockly.utils.xml.texttodomdocument.md) | Converts an XML string into a DOM tree. |
